solution_line_template: A year is {months_per_year} months, so Elias spends {cost_per_bar} * {months_per_year} = $<<{cost_per_bar}*{months_per_year}={cost_per_year}>>{cost_per_year} per year on bars of soap.
In {num_years} years, he spends {num_years} * {cost_per_year} = $<<{num_years}*{cost_per_year}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} on bars of soap.
